items.content_html: LightBox_Js_Plugin-45 is a lightweight, modern, and responsive lightbox plugin that is easy to use and customizable. It has no dependencies and works with all modern browsers. It is also relatively easy to customize the appearance of the lightbox because it doesnâ€™t ship with a lot of predefined themes or custom classes. Go wild!!.

It has no dependencies and works with all modern browsers.  It is also relatively easy to customize the appearance of the lightbox because it doesnâ€™t ship with a lot of predefined themes or custom classes. Go wild!!.
